title: i need help get access to my account it has been hacked
body: my account has been hacked and i cant get access to it. im using my friends account because i cant even log in. i look at my match history and someone has been playing my acccount.

replies.body: Just to be safe you should get off your friend's account in case of another potential compromise (we also don't support account sharing).  No worries, though, we can help!  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) instead, and our account team can help with recovery and information updates.  See you there!
